name: ring-target
effect: Held : When one of the user’s types would render it immune to damage, that type is ignored for damage calculation.
short_effect: Held: Negates the holder’s type immunities. Ability immunities are not removed.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Moves that normally have no effect will land on a Pokémon holding it.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Moves that normally have no effect will land on a Pokémon holding it.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Moves that normally have no effect will land on a Pokémon holding it.
